executable.title: InflateMedialModel
executable.description: This is a CLI module that can be used to inflate a medial model
executable.contributor: Paul Yushkevich (PICSL), Alison Pouch (PICSL), Christian Herz (CHOP), Andras Lasso (PerkLab, Queen's), Matthew Jolley (CHOP/UPenn)
executable.acknowledgements: This work was partially funded by NIH grant NXNNXXNNNNNN-NNXN

parameters.label: IO
parameters.geometry: > outputSurface Output Model output 1 Input model
